# Two points again

> Получил файл с огромными числами. Явно RSA

---

> I received a file with huge numbers. Explicitly RSA

## [Вывод / Output](output_badRSA1.txt)

```plain
N = 
e = 49999
c = 
```

## Решение / Solution

Через [factordb.com] можно проверить, что `n` - простое число. Тогда `p = N`, `q = 1`,
`phi = N - 1`, `d = e ^ -1 % (N - 1)`, `m = c ^ (e ^ -1 % (N - 1)) % N`.

```python
from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytes
print(long_to_bytes(pow(c, pow(e, -1, N - 1), n)))
```

Флаг:

```plain
grodno{m@thematical_pr0perties_0f_l@rge_prime_numb3rs}
```

---

Via [factordb.com] you can check that `n` is a prime number. Then `p = N`, `q = 1`, `phi = N - 1`,
`d = e ^ -1 % (N - 1)`, `m = c ^ (e ^ -1 % (N - 1)) % N`.

```python
from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytes
print(long_to_bytes(pow(c, pow(e, -1, N - 1), n)))
```

Flag:

```plain
grodno{m@thematical_pr0perties_0f_l@rge_prime_numb3rs}
```
